mapper.select: select u.id as 'id', u.icon as 'icon', d.name as 'name', (select GROUP_CONCAT(content) from sys_doctor_label where del_flag='0' and type='3' and id in (select labelid from sys_doctor_label_item where doctorid=u.id and del_flag='0')) as 'label', case d.technical when 1 then '医师' when 2 then '主治医师' when 3 then '副主任医师' when 4 then '主任医师' else '禁用' end as 'technical', d.introduce as 'introduce' from sys_user_info u left join sys_doctor_info d on u.id = d.doctorid where u.del_flag = '0' and d.del_flag = '0' limit 0,1
select * from sys_banner_info where del_flag = '0' order by position asc limit 0,6
